com.mygdx.game

Class EnemyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.EnemyManager

  • public class EnemyManager
extends java.lang.Object
    EnemyManager class spawns and keeps track of all enemy objects.
    Author:
    Sean Aubrey, Gabriel Fountain, Brandon Conn

      • update

        public void update(float playerX,
                   float playerY,
                   float deltaTime)
        Updates timers and spawner methods. Clears enemies if their health is below 0.
        Parameters:
        playerX - Player's x position
        playerY - Player's y position
        deltaTime - time between frames
